column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This tourist attraction is mostly for tourist most Chicagoans pass on a slice of pizza that's so filling they don't need to eat for a full day. Trust me
column2: if people in Chicago regularly ate Lou Malnatis Chicago style pizza there wouldn't be anyone here. Jam packed with carbs
column4: sugar that you can't taste and calories this delicious treat is not designed for regular consumption.
